app.name: BusRouter SG
app.title: $t(app.name) - Singapore Bus Routes Explorer
app.description: Explore bus stops and routes on the map for all bus services in Singapore, with realtime bus arrival times and per-bus-stop passing routes overview.

search.placeholder: Search for bus service or stop

service.title: Bus service {{serviceNumber}}: {{serviceName}} - $t(app.name)
service.oppositeLegend: Bus stops with opposite direction of services

stop.title: Bus stop {{stopNumber}}: {{stopName}} - $t(app.name)
stop.multipleDirectionsWarning: Some services serve multiple directions. Open "Bus arrivals" to see more details.

arrivals.title: Bus arrival times
arrivals.multipleVisitsLegend: 1st or 2nd visit. Bus stops here twice, going in different directions. Check destination before boarding.
